Attributes.description: Psychological abilities underlying human language; language processing, lexical representation, and principles of online conversation; animal versus human communication.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) PSYC 100 or (b) two of PSYC 101, PSYC 102, PSYC 205, PSYC 207, PSYC 208, PSYC 216, PSYC 217, PSYC 277. (Strongly recommended: PSYC 101 and either PSYC 216 or one of PSYC 217 or 277. Non-PSYC students may substitute ENGL 329, or LING 420, or LING 200 and 201 for the above prerequisite.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Thu, Start Time: 17:00, End Time: 20:00, Building: West, Room: Mall
